short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your tabs into folders and manage them easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple web extension which help you manage your browser tabs more efficiently with a simple ui.

Keep your browser organise by grouping related tabs in folders. No need to save thousands of bookmarks. Just create folders for related tabs and save tabs in those folders. 

Features:
- Create folder for related tabs.
- Delete folders which you don't need
- Add specific tabs to specific folders
- Remove tabs which you don't need
